feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking GIF-update feature to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend Valentine feature files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining Valentine-themed colors and animations.
frontend/index.html: App HTML entry point loading Poppins font and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component rendering the ValentineFlow controller.
frontend/src/features/valentine/componen: Floating audio player that autoplays themed music and allows play/pause toggling.
Displays animated falling hearts generated by useFallingHearts.
Renders Back/Next navigation buttons using flowOrder helpers.
GIF component with error handling and fallback text display.
Centered card layout wrapper for all Valentine screens.
frontend/src/features/valentine/content/: Centralized asset URLs including updated user-provided GIFs and music file.
Defines the sequential screen flow and utilities to get next/previous screens.
Centralized string constants for all screens, quizzes, labels, and fallbacks.
frontend/src/features/valentine/effects/: Hook managing user-supplied Valentine GIF URLs with validation and persistence.
Hook spawning and cleaning up animated falling hearts with randomized behavior.
Provides a hook that generates temporary glitter particle positions and clears them after one second.
frontend/src/features/valentine/screens/: Renders a screen letting users pick one of three gifts and navigate between screens.
Displays a congratulations message with a GIF and a button to proceed to the gift selection.
Shows a surprise box that reveals a message and triggers glitter particles when clicked.
Implements a multi‑question quiz flow with correct/wrong feedback and navigation to the next gift.
Shows a heartfelt message with a GIF and lets users return to the gift selection.
Displays a GIF and title for gift 3 with a button to return to the gift menu.
Empty file placeholder for a success screen.
Shows the welcome message, GIF, and a button to begin the Valentine flow.
Asks the user to be their Valentine with customizable GIF support and growing 'Yes' button behavior.
frontend/src/features/valentine/Valentin: Controls screen navigation and renders hearts, music, and the current Valentine screen.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables, Valentine-themed styles, and global gradients for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, components, animations, and dark mode support using CSS variables.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, issues, and architectural notes for the Valentine React project.
